ch0016_40_huuro/0101_0701_01_10:
Hey there, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I’m looking
forward to another day of fun with you!
ch0016_40_huuro/0101_0701_02_10:
Togekiss and I are ready to fly! Just let us know
when it’s time to go exploring!
ch0016_40_huuro/7101_0701_01_10: Um...how do you like this new look?
ch0016_40_huuro/7101_0701_02_10:
The clothes I usually wear are blue, so people
often say they suit me since they’re the color of
the sky.
ch0016_40_huuro/7101_0701_03_10:
But I’m really loving this red look, too! It’s also
nice and warm!
ch0016_40_huuro/7102_0701_01_10:
In Unova, I work as a cargo pilot, and when I’m
dressed like this, it’s like I’m about to make a
special delivery of joy!
ch0016_40_huuro/7102_0701_02_10:
Together with Togekiss, the bringer of blessings, 
I’ll make sure everything gets delivered right!
ch0016_40_huuro/7103_0701_01_10: Togekiss is known as the bringer of blessings!
ch0016_40_huuro/7103_0701_02_10: So I want to deliver those blessings to everyone!
ch0016_40_huuro/7103_0701_03_10: It’s time to hit the runway again today!
ch0016_40_huuro/7104_0701_01_10:
The Pokémon Professor from Unova is always
cheerful and fun to be around...
ch0016_40_huuro/7104_0701_02_10:
But sometimes she forgets that she’s asked people
to do things...
ch0016_40_huuro/7104_0701_03_10:
She might be a little more lax than
Professor Bellis.
ch0016_40_huuro/7105_0701_02_10:
Oh, you’re not having enough fun?
In that case...
ch0016_40_huuro/7105_0701_03_10: why don’t you have some fun with us?
ch0016_40_huuro/1701_0701_01_10: You’ve been good, so here’s a present for you!
ch0016_40_huuro/1701_0701_02_10: I hope you can enjoy it as something special!
ch0016_40_huuro/1701_0702_01_10:
Presents sure make you excited before and after
you open them, huh?
ch0016_40_huuro/2501_0701_01_10:
This outfit is really warm, so I can fly high without
worrying about the cold!
ch0016_40_huuro/2501_0701_02_10: It’s perfect for Pokémon battling in the air, too!
ch0016_40_huuro/2501_0701_03_10: It’s warm and cute, so I’m really liking it!
ch0016_40_huuro/2501_0702_01_10:
The other day, I was flying with Togekiss, and
there was some snow falling from really high 
in the sky!
ch0016_40_huuro/2501_0702_02_10:
It was really pretty to see, but it was so cold, we
had to head right back home! Hee hee!
ch0016_40_huuro/2511_0701_01_10:
Whenever I go to deliver things with Togekiss,
something good always miraculously happens!
ch0016_40_huuro/2511_0701_02_10:
Sometimes people will invite us in for tea...
or sometimes for cake...
ch0016_40_huuro/2511_0701_03_10:
Hm? I’m only talking about food? But it makes me
happy just to eat something yummy!
ch0016_40_huuro/2511_0702_01_10:
Togekiss is really popular with the people we
deliver to! They always tell us to come back soon!
ch0016_40_huuro/2511_0702_02_10:
I’m really proud to have Togekiss as my partner,
and being around him makes me so happy!
ch0016_40_huuro/3001_0701_01_10: Morning! I hope today’s full of fun!
ch0016_40_huuro/3003_0701_01_10:
Hi there! The weather’s perfect for a flight today.
What do you say?
ch0016_40_huuro/3005_0701_01_10:
Playing outside at night always gives me
such a thrill! You have to be careful, though.
It’s kinda hard to see.
